alert.note: Alert for Chemung (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 07 at 2:46PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central New York, including the following counties, Chemung and Steuben. * WHEN...Until 845 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 239 PM EST, emergency management reported heavy rain in the advisory area. This will cause small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding especially in the Big Flats area along County Road 64. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen with additional light to moderate rain falling in the headwater. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Cutler Creek, Meads Creek, Cuthrie Run, Borden Creek, Tioga River, Wolf Run, Madison Creek, Whisky Creek, Cohocton River, Post Creek, Dry Run, Winfield Creek, Bailey Creek, Sing Sing Creek, Mulholland Creek, Newtown Creek, Hoffman Brook, Michigan Creek, Curtis Creek, Lime Kiln Creek, Chemung River and Hendy Creek. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Corning, Big Flats, Horseheads, Campbell, Painted Post, Hornby, South Corning, East Corning, Gang Mills, Meads Creek, Coopers Plains, Erwins, Gibson, Tompkins Corners, Fisherville, Elmira Airport and Big Flats Airport. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
